channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- Modicon M340 CPU (part numbers BMXP34*)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- Modicon M340 CPU (part numbers BMXP34*)

item.title: CVE-2023-6408|2024-08-02T08:28:21.776Z -- schneider%20electric -- modicon%20m340%20cpu%20%28part%20numbers%20bmxp34%2A%29
item.description: CWE-924: Improper Enforcement of Message Integrity During Transmission in a Communication Channel vulnerability exists that could cause a denial of service and loss of confidentiality, integrity of controllers when conducting a Man in the Middle attack.
